content.html: I was 50/50 on sharing this but fuck it: Gen Ashley engaged in some GROSS attempts to try and get me to speak at the Modern Frontends disaster. She BOOKED A DEMO WITH PING TO GET ME INTO A CALL AND PITCH IT. Massive red flags from her. I regret not sharing earlier.
content.value:
I was 50/50 on sharing this but fuck it: Gen Ashley engaged in some GROSS attempts to try and get me to speak at the Modern Frontends disaster.

She BOOKED A DEMO WITH PING TO GET ME INTO A CALL AND PITCH IT.

Massive red flags from her. I regret not sharing earlier.
